\label{_details}
\hypertarget{_details}{}
\subsection{Detailed Description}
DALSIAP\_\-TEST -- Test the SIAP service interface.

This test program exercises and demonstrates the DALClient SIAP service interface, and most of the full DALClient library in the process. Only the standard client API is used here (no use of internals).

\begin{Desc}
\item[Author:]Doug Tody \end{Desc}
\begin{Desc}
\item[Version:]January 2014 \end{Desc}
